title.value: V2 Table: Time Selection Criteria Parameter Class Codes

description.value: Underlying Code System for V2 table 0294 (Time Selection Criteria Parameter Class Codes)

copyright.value: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain

display.value: An indicator that there is a preferred start time for the appointment request, service or resource.

definition.value: An indicator that there is a preferred start time for the appointment request, service or resource.

display.value: An indicator that there is a preferred end time for the appointment request, service or resource.

definition.value: An indicator that there is a preferred end time for the appointment request, service or resource.

valueString.value: OK = Preferred appointment day NO = Day is not preferred

display.value: An indicator that Monday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur.

definition.value: An indicator that Monday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur.

valueString.value: OK = Preferred appointment day NO = Day is not preferred

display.value: An indicator that Tuesday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur.

definition.value: An indicator that Tuesday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur.

valueString.value: OK = Preferred appointment day NO = Day is not preferred

display.value: An indicator that Wednesday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur.

definition.value: An indicator that Wednesday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur.

valueString.value: OK = Preferred appointment day NO = Day is not preferred

display.value: An indicator that Thursday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur.

definition.value: An indicator that Thursday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur.

valueString.value: OK = Preferred appointment day NO = Day is not preferred

display.value: An indicator that Friday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur.

definition.value: An indicator that Friday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur.

valueString.value: OK = Preferred appointment day NO = Day is not preferred

display.value: An indicator that Saturday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur.

definition.value: An indicator that Saturday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur.

valueString.value: OK = Preferred appointment day NO = Day is not preferred

display.value: An indicator that Sunday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur.

definition.value: An indicator that Sunday is or is not preferred for the day on which the appointment will occur.
